name: An enormous blackened flambard called 'Wailing Death' (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (awesome in general).
It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It does psionic damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
The blade can sometimes disrupt the opponent's spellcasting.
The malevolent magics of the blade increase its damage versus the
Three Shards of the Gods can be embedded into the blade of this sword.
